dialogue: Well, Eminence, I’d say this is a pretty fair vision of hell.
Don’t be blasphemous, Ray. Hell arrives tomorrow when we bring in the cardinals.
How on earth does one pronounce this? Salso?
Archbishop Wozniak has asked if he may have a word, Eminence?
I don’t think that’s possible. The cardinals will begin arriving in an hour. What’s it about?
He didn’t say. . I wouldn’t have mentioned it but he seemed so...upset?
We’re going to be sequestered from six o’clock. He should have come earlier.
Yes, your Eminence. I’ll tell him.
Ray? Tell him I’ll see him after I’ve met the cardinals. The poor fellow will be worrying about his future. O’
Getting puffed up with my own importance, Willi.
The Conclave will be over in a few days and then no-one will be interested in me.
Perhaps he isn’t coming?
That would be too much to hope for.
We can wait inside if you prefer?
No, let’s get some fresh air while we still can.
No, Your Eminence. We seem to have acquired one. I mean it literally, Eminence. Another cardinal has just turned up.
If we’ve left someone off the list...
He was never on our lists. He says he was created in pectore.
He h as to be an imposter, surely?
That’s what I thought, Eminence. But Archbishop Mandorff has spoken to him and thinks not.
What’s this I’m hearing?
Dean, your homily... I’m not entirely clear whether or not it should be placed in the Vatican archive or not? As it was not the homily you... actually... delivered?
I’m not sure either.
Was it that bad, Ray?
Not at all, Your Eminence. It has caused quite a stir. I don’t think anyone expected you to... to...
Say something interesting?
Thank you, Father.

The media have noticed the presence of a cardinal who doesn’t appear on the official lists, Dean. The press off ice have been receiving requests for information, so I’ve taken the liberty of putting together a draft statement. I’ve also put together some biographical details for you. Ministries in Veracruz, the Congo, established a hospital for female victims of the genocidal sexual violence during the first and second wars. Then Baghdad. And finally the Mission in Ka bul. There was some question of his resigning on health grounds, but apparently the Holy Father convinced him to continue. He’s certainly served his ministry in some terrible places.
On health grounds? Look into that will you Ray? Kind of thing the press like to get hold of.
And the other matter...?
I spoke to Monsignor Morales. He was emphatic that he knows of no reason why Cardinal Tremblay should not be Pope.
Thank you.
However, will you forgive me if I say that I did not entirely believe the good monsignor?

He was just... so emphatic? My Spanish is quite poor and I may have... accidentally... given him the impression that you had seen a document that contr adicted that? And he said you weren’t to worry about that. His exact words were - “El informe ha sido retirado.”
A “report?” A report on what? Withdrawn when?
That I couldn’t say, Eminence.
Good morning, Your Eminence. Did you sleep well?
Perfectly, thank you.
The buses are ready.
I think I’ll walk.
Oh, do go away.

Forgive me. I know you said we should forget the matter of the withdrawn report but...I wondered in light of Cardinal Tremblay’s present...position? I could see if there was anything more I could find out?
I’m not a Wi tchfinder. It isn’t my job to go hunting for secrets in my colleagues’ pasts!
I’m sorry, Ray. No more investigations. I think we’ve heard enough secrets. Let God’s Will be done.
Good night then, Your Eminence.
Everyone has been taken to the Casa Santa Marta, Your Eminence. No one was seriously hurt. Some cuts, that’s all.
And outside? In the city? How bad is it?
Dear God.
How are you feeling?
I was looking at the darkness at the top of the painting.
Your Eminence? The Conclave? Do we continue?
Complete privacy, Willi.
My brothers, I would like to have the authority of the Conclave to discuss what has happened.
It wasn’t... It wasn’t the outcome I expected.
No. But it’s wonderful all the same.
If it’s my position you’re worried about, let me reassure you I feel nothing but relief. Our new Holy Father will make a much greater Pope than I ever would have done.
Just tell me what’s troubling you.
I found out... Switzerland. Cardinal Benitez’ trip to Switzerland.
Switzerland? You mean the hospital in Geneva?
It wasn’t a hospital. It was a clinic.
A clinic for what?
